description: Enjoy this healthier take on chicken curry that's so wonderfully fragrant, easy to make and ready in three steps.
keywords: Indian curry,Seafood free,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Jun 2021,Winter,Sesame free,Soy free,Autumn,Chicken,Dairy free
name: Healthier Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500g chicken breast fillets, cut into 2cm pieces
0.5 bunch coriander, leaves picked, roots washed and finely chopped
400g can Woolworths no-added salt diced tomatoes
1 large red capsicum, halved, deseeded, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 1 tbs oil in a large, deep frying pan over medium heat. Cook chicken, stirring, for 5 minutes or until browned. Remove from pan.
Heat remaining oil over medium heat. Cook onion, stirring, for 5 minutes or until light golden. Add garlic, masala, curry powder and coriander roots. Cook, stirring, for 1 minute or until fragrant.

Add tomatoes, 3/4 cup water, carrot and capsicum, then bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer, stirring occasionally, for 30 minutes, adding chicken to pan for the last 10 minutes of cooking, or until sauce has thickened and chicken is cooked through. Season with pepper. Top rice with curry and coriander leaves. Serve with naan.
